question: There are 181 first-graders at Oak Ridge School. 70 of them are girls. On Monday, 4 first-grade girls and 8 first-grade boys were absent. How many first grade boys were at Oak Ridge School on Monday?
answer:
Of the 181 first graders, 70 are girls, so 181 students - 70 girls = <<181-70=111>>111 boys.
On Monday there were 111 boys - 8 absent = <<111-8=103>>103 boys.
#### 103
